name: EIP
description: The AWS::EC2::EIP resource allocates an Elastic IP (EIP) address and can, optionally, associate it with an Amazon EC2 instance.

properties.name: InstanceId
properties.description: The Instance ID of the Amazon EC2 instance that you want to associate with this Elastic IP address.

properties.name: Domain
properties.description: Set to vpc to allocate the address to your Virtual Private Cloud (VPC). No other values are supported.

attributes.name: AllocationId
attributes.description: The ID that AWS assigns to represent the allocation of the address for use with Amazon VPC. This is returned only for VPC elastic IP addresses. Example return value: eipalloc-5723d13e
